elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which measure should be the focus in order to improve the efficiency and organization of a project?
choices: a) Daily diary entries about personal experiences
b) Create a table with colored bars for tasks
c) Create a mind map with project details
d) Noting personal feelings in the course of the project
correctAnswer: b) Create a table with colored bars for tasks

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Explanation
elements.correctAnswer: Option b) describes the use of a visual table with coloured bars to show progress in the completion of tasks, which is an efficient form of organization. The other options do not relate to the measures described for improving project organization.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Which activity primarily helps to identify and address potential problems during a project at an early stage?
choices: a) Create a table with colored bars for tasks
b) Making a note of personal experiences
c) List of possible problems and their solutions
correctAnswer: c) List of possible problems and their solutions

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Explanation
elements.correctAnswer: Option c) refers to the identification and resolution of potential problems, which is an important step in project planning.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Which measure helps to prepare for possible changes in the project?
choices: c) Development of an adaptation plan
d) Noting down mistakes made by team members
correctAnswer: c) Development of an adaptation plan

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Explanation
elements.correctAnswer: Option c) refers to planning adjustments in case unexpected changes occur in the project, which is an important project management practice.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What activities support continuous learning from mistakes and challenges from past projects?
choices: a) Writing reports on the progress of the project
d) Continuous noting of hurdles and errors
correctAnswer: a) Writing reports on the progress of the project
d) Continuous noting of hurdles and errors

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Explanation
elements.correctAnswer: Options a) and d) refer to the important practice of continuously documenting hurdles and errors in order to learn from them and avoid or better solve them in future projects.
